welcome: It looks like this is the first time you've used Tango. Welcome!
welcome-2: There's just a few steps you'll need to complete before you can start playing.
step-1-description: Make sure they're pristine, unpatched ROMs.
step-1-error: Could not find any supported ROMs. Please make sure they're unpatched!
step-2-description: Make sure they match the games you've put in the ROMs folder.
step-2-error: Could not find any supported saves. Please make sure they correspond to the ROMs.
